string.value: You don't appear to be in any games right now... Start game lah noob..or wait until someone start lah.
{0} has started a game! Use /join to get in on the fun well it’s an orgy so…..:^)…..:P
A new game has been started by {0}! Use /join to get eaten!
{0} has started a chaos game! Use /join to get in on the fun... and probably die :P
A new chaos game has been started by {0}! Use /join to get eaten!
EH SIAL LA YOU THINK THIS ONE YOUR GRANDFATHER GROUP AH? Game running liao can wait awhile or not? You rushing for what?
Join liao la. Eh sai dan bo? You blur like sotong la sial.
1 minute left to /join
{0} seconds left to /join
Seems like a lot of players fly your aeroplane ah. Not enough players, cancelling game!
Game is starting, please wait while I assign roles and update the database.
{0} is banned for attempting an exploit (no names starting with /)
{0}, please change your name to join
Sorry, game is full!
{0} has joined the game. {1} players, {2} minimum, {3} max
{0} Please click the start button below or {1} and start me, so I can PM you your role. MUAHAHAHAHA. You may not join the game until you do so do it fast.
You can't run away! Can die properly or not? Lie down again leh.
{0} has fled in terror! Like a chicken..useless fellow
{0} players remain.
Hey I didn't ask you anything yet!
You don't seem to be playing...
Name not found!
This answer is not valid!
{0} has voted to eat {1}.
{0} has voted to lynch {1}. Got no brotherhood ah {0}
{0} has not voted for 2 nights in a row. Suddenly, {0} kena one time jialat jialat and suddenly fall dead. {1}
You very the two faced ah…. You are now the wolf...
Choice accepted.
The seer is {0}.
{0} was the seer. As the apprentice, you have a leadership succession to evolve becoming the new seer.
{0} was an apprentice, and has now stepped up to fill {1}'s place as the new Seer. Watch your backside. .
You see {0} is {1}!
Who do you want to lynch?
Who do you want to detect?
Who do you want to shoot ? {0} bullet(s) remain.
Who do you want to visit?
Who do you want to see?
Who do you want to guard?
Who do you want to makan? Choose wisely ah, later poisonous.

Who is your role model?
Who do you want to convert to your order?
Make sure you discuss with {0}
and
You are cursed. You are a villager at this time, but if the wolves choose to kill you, you will become a werewolf yourself. (Why isn’t there a bomoh?)
You are the detective. During the day, you may choose a player to reveal their role. However - in doing so, your role could be revealed to the wolves! (40% chance) Good luck Sherlock!
Congrats! You're the village drunk! Please don’t drive. Just no.
You are the Guardian Angel. Each night, you may choose a player to save. However, if you choose a wolf, there is a 50% chance you will die.

You are the gunner. You have two bullets. During the day, you may choose to shoot another player. Everyone will hear the shots, and know you are the gunner . Please don't be cock-eyed or a bobo shooter. PLEASE.

You slut! You are the Harlot. During the night, you may choose to visit another player, to verify that they are not a wolf , and have some fun on his disco stick….. However, should you choose to visit a wolf, or visit someone killed by the wolf, the wolf will eat you and him. If you do go to visit though, and the wolf tries to kill you at your home, you will survive.
Traitor! For now, you are a villager, but once all the wolves die, their power will be transferred to you….. If the seer looks to you, you may or may not be identified as a wolf.
YOU ARE A WOLF!! XD (good on ya) Each night you can choose to eat someone.
You are the seer. Each night, you may choose a player to 'see', and reveal their role/ naked body to you. Enjoy.
You are a lowly villager, doomed to spend your days counting chickens, feeding cows and driving a truck and hope you win 4D.
You are the tanner. If you get lynched, you win liao lor!
You are a wild child! #Rabak #Havoc This means you can ponteng sekolah. Pick a korkor or jiejie to be your 'role model' - if they die, you become a werewolf.

You are the beholder, you will be told who the (real) seer is - that is your only function. Other then that , you are a villager! Doomed to spend your days counting chickens, feeding cows and driving a truck and hope you win 4D.
You are the apprentice seer. If the (real) seer dies, you will take their place as the seer.
You are a cultist. Every night, you may choose a player to convert to a cultist. If all remaining living players at the end are cultists, they win.

You are the Cultist Hunter, trying to stop the cult in town from converting everyone! Each night, choose a player. If they are a cultist, they die. If the cult tries to convert you, the cult's newest member dies.
Dusk draws near, and the villagers gather to decide who they are lynching this evening... Everyone now has {0} seconds to vote!
It is now day time. All of you have {0} seconds to make your accusations, defenses, or just bitch about the cost of living and GST.

Night has fallen. Another stressful day, and all has gone to bed. Have you locked your gates,doors and window? Please don’t become a victim of burglary. Night players: you have {0} seconds use your actions!
The villagers have cast their votes, amid doubts and suspicions. {0} is dead. {1}
Unable to come up with a proper decision on who to lynch, the mob returns to their homes for the night, frustrated like a certain real life event that involved voting.
Something is fishy, for no one voted! No lynch mob tonight...because blackout

The villagers gather in the morning, but do not see {0}. They wander over to the house, to find {0} disemboweled, with red paint splashed all over their door. You know how you your mum taught you not to be so kaypo and make “dunno”? Well, the Ah long felt threatened and so the Polis inspektor {0} is dead
Morning comes, and to everyone's dismay, impaled on top of the twin towers {0}, the Guardian Angel.

As everyone comes out of their houses, they find pieces of a shotgun strewn about... then legs... then fingers... then the body of {0}, floating in the fountain in Perdana Botanical Garden , dead from a werewolf attack. You have lost your gunner.
The villagers awake in the morning, to find the disemboweled remains of {0} hunched over a Ouija board,a bomoh guide and some food from last night. The Seer is dead!

Everyone wakes to the sound of screaming from The Drunk’s house . They rush over to find a pig head hung on the door. Upon Further probing, {0} chopped up remains are found nearby. Was it wolves or Ah long’s who killed him ? Hm…..
As the sun rises above the village, the villagers find the corpse of {0} bleeding over a letter from the middle east and with a deposit slip of ….1.4 BILLION?! The Fool is dead.
As everyone rises in the morning, they smell a terrible stink. They follow the smell to find {0} shredded apart in the pig pen, head missing. NOMNOMNOMNOM {1}
A noticeable stench is coming from {0}'s house... the village inspects it to find a body lying in front of a dark altar. A cultist has been killed by the cult hunter!
The villagers gather the next morning in the village center, to sighs of relief - it appears there was no attack the previous night.
You have been killed by the wolves. As you were cursed, you have now become a wolf!
Your wolf counterpart(s): {0}
{0} was bitten... but was cursed, and became a werewolf! Congrats on your new teammate!
Oh no! The wolves eated you. NOMNOMNOMNOM
Oh no! {0} was a drunk! Now you are drunk, and can't attack tomorrow night...
You tried to guard a wolf! The wolf has eaten you. 忘恩负义！！！
You have saved {0}'s life!
{0} was not attacked, so you didn't do much of anything.
You went to guard {0}, but they weren't home!
A guardian angel was watching over you last night and fought off the wolves! WAH HENG AH!
The harlot chose the wrong night to stay home. {0} has been eaten by the wolves! SEBEI SUEY AH YOU!
Odd... {0} was not home! No dinner for you… You make your way to the mamak and order one roti john and one egg before going home
You slip into {0}'s house for a little fun, only to be confronted by a wolf. You are dead.
{0} slipped into the wrong house last night! {0}'s slutty remains are found pinned to Kl Sentral’s flagpole with an iron rod...
{0} slips into {1}'s house, ready to have a little fun to ease off the stress. Instead, {0} finds a werewolf eating {1}! The werewolf quickly turns on {0} and jumps... {0} is dead.
You see {0} is not a wolf, as you got fucked good and hard all night long!
It was a bit dark, so you couldn't see well enough, but in the middle of the night you wake up to the harlot riding you. Both of you finish up, then they slip back out silently...
You caught {0} snooping about! That must be the detective!
Your snooping has shown you that {0} is {1}.
Looks like {0} came back positive after a night with the Harlot! The gunner got revenge. {1} is dead.
Suddenly, a shot rings out. The village turns to see {0} standing over {1}'s body, a gun still aimed at the head. {2}
The werewolf has won!
The werewolves have won!
The villagers have won! All the wolves have died...
YOU BODOH AH? LYNCH THE TANNER NOW YOU SEE LA !YOU SEE LA! OBI-GOOD.
Remaining living players, roles, and team:
{0} has voted to convert {1}
{0} was sent to do your dirty work, and convert {1}... however, they were the cult hunter! {0} is dead!
{0} came to your house last night, ready to convert you.... but you shoved your sword right through him. A cultist is dead... {1} remain!
The cult has converted you to their order! You are now a cultist. Every other night, you will have a chance to convert another player.
Cultists: {0}
{0} has joined the cult!
{0} was sent to do your dirty work, and convert {1}... but no one was home. You make your way to the mamak and ask for 2 kosong before going home
All the wolves have died, and the only people left standing have all been converted to cultists.. The cult has won! HOOGA HOOGA HOOGA
You went to hunt {0}, but they are already dead!
You go into {0}'s house and find them praying before an altar to some unknown god. You quickly run your sword right through the evil cultist.
You go to {0}'s house, but there is no mysterious chanting. You return home, convinced that {0} is not a cultist.
{0}'s korkor or jiejie just died! In their rage, they have become a werewolf!
{0} has died! In your rage, you have become a werewolf! Your new teammates are: {1}
a Villager 👱
the Drunk 🍻
the Harlot 💋
the Seer 👳
the Traitor 🖕
the Guardian Angel 👼
the Detective 🕵
a Werewolf 🐺
the Cursed 😾
the Gunner 🔫
the Tanner 👺
the Fool 🃏
the Wild Child 👶
the Beholder 👁
the Apprentice Seer 🙇
a Cultist 👤
the Cultist Hunter 💂
Ran away
💀 Dead
🙂 Alive
Players Alive
a Mason 👷
You are a Mason. If there are any other masons, you will know who they are. Otherwise, you are a villager.
As everyone rises, they find the body of {0} shoved into a pile of stone, blood splattered everywhere. One of your masons has died!
The masons are: {0}
Your newest member heads over to {0}'s house to convert them, but instead finds the house a complete wreck, blood everywhere, and bits of wolf fur snagged on the doorway...
The pack heads to {0}'s house to eat them, but they are met by a tall dark figure, armed to the teeth. The Guardian Angel fights everyone off, and you head back defeated.
You send {0} to try to convert {1}, however their belief was too strong, and you were unable to convert them :(
@{1}, a player with the name {0} has already joined. Please change your name to join.
You slipped into {0}'s house for a bit of fun... but as you are leaving, you happen to notice a strange altar, poorly hidden off in a side room, with a strange glowing coming from it...
was
Everyone wakes up in the morning, and notices that {0} is not around... They check the house to find the remains of {0}.
As the villagers gather as the sun rises, the find the remains of {0}, who died somehow last night...
Odd.... {0} didn't show up for the masons meeting this morning... O.o
Fleeing while the game is running has been disabled by the group admin!
is dead
{0} added to admin list. Use /config to change group settings.
You are already in a game! ({0})
Your group has managed to start multiple games... Killing extras.
Your group is currently in the queue. Position: {0} / {1}
Sorry, I'm about to start a short maintenance break, you can't start a game right now.\nWaiting on {0} games to end...\nGo to @werewolfdev for more information
Sorry, max concurrent games has been reached ({0}). \nPosition in queue: {1} / {1}
{0} is a preferred group, and has skipped the queue!
There is no game running. Start a new game with /startgame or start a chaos game with /startchaos
Only a group admin can run this command.
After this game, I am shutting down for maintenance.
After this game, I am shutting down momentarily for an update (automated).
UserId was null. Are you sure you sent this as a reply?
{0} is already an admin!
{0} is not an admin!
{0} removed from admin list.
Language set to {0}
No seer!
Time's up!
You are Cupid. Sent to Earth with only underpants, a bow and two arrows, you get to choose two players to love each other for eternity. If one of them dies, the other one dies of sorrow.

You are a Doppelgänger. Legend has it that your ancestors were metamorphs, and could choose any form they wanted. You have inherited some of their capacities. Choose a player, when that player dies, you will take on their role.

You are the town Hunter. You do not sleep well, and you would never go to bed without your rifle. If you die, you can choose someone else to kill. If you are eaten, you have a chance to take a werewolf down, but will not be able to choose a player to kill.
You are the serial killer. Recently escaped from the local asylum, your goal is for everyone else to die. Every night, you can add a player's body to your collection.
You have been struck by love. {0}'s memory will never fade in your heart. Your goal is for both of you to survive. If one of you dies, the other one will die out of sorrow.
The village has chosen to hang you! This is your last chance, choose to shoot someone as you go down!
{0} fumbles for their pistol as the noose tightens, but cannot get it in time, and falls to their death with a loud snap of their neck...
{0} whips out their pistol and looks at the crowd... and cannot make a decision on who to shoot. They fall to their death, accepting their fate...
As the noose tightens, {0} whips out a pistol, takes aim, and shoots {1} as the floor drops out! {1} falls over, dead. {2}
You've been murdered! In your last moments, you have the chance to shoot someone... make it quick!
The shot to {0} was too much, so much that they couldn't even reach for their sidearm, as they lay in a pool of blood...
As {0} lays there, gasping for their final breaths, they can't decide who to shoot... and accept their fate.
As the bullet pierces {0}, they fall to the ground.... but not without grasping their pistol, and firing upon {1}, who takes a bullet right between the eyes. {2}

{0} sneaks over to {1}'s house, pops open the door, and is immediately greeted by a crazed maniac with a knife!!! {1} plunges the knife deep into {0}'s organs in alphabetical order, cackling the entire time! {0} is dead D:
The wolves tried to attack the hunter last night, but the hunter was able to take one down with them as he died! {0} has died (wolf)
The wolf tried to attack the hunter last night, but the hunter was able to take the wolf {0} down with their rifle!
The wolves attempted to have a nice late night snack, but were instead greeted by a crazed murderer! {0} was killed in the fight!

It seemed a quiet enough night for {0}, but they were wrong. The villagers gather in the morning to find {0} split from head to toe, but oddly the liver was missing... The serial killer has struck again! {1}
You tried to collect {0}'s body for your collection, but you were fought off by the guardian angel! No kill for you tonight...
The cult sends {0} to try to convert {1}, but instead a shot rings out and {0}'s body comes flying out of the window! {0} is dead....
The cult sends {0} to try to convert {1}, but instead a {0}'s body comes flying out of the window, knives pushed into every part of their body! WHAT A PSYCHO! {0} is dead....
You tried to guard the serial killer, but they came out and stabbed you 89 times! You are dead....
You slip into {0}'s house, and start having a little fun. All seems great until {0} pulls out a knife and starts stabbing you, laughing like a maniac! You have died....
don't worry about this string for now! {0}
The doppelganger {0} has now become a mason, just like you!
{0} has died, and you transform into a mason. Your teammates (if any) are: {1}
The doppelganger {0} has now become a cultist, just like you!
{0} has died, and you transform into a cultist. Your teammates (if any) are: {1}
The doppelganger {0} has now become a wolf, just like you!
{0} has died, and you transform into a wolf. Your teammates (if any) are: {1}
The only person left standing is the serial killer! They have won!
Who do you want to kill tonight?
With {0}'s dying breath, {1} rushes over and falls, crying. They cannot stand the loss of their loved one, and shoot themselves with the nearest pistol they can find. {2}
Who do you want to become if they die?
Who do you want the lovers to be? Choose the first player
Who do you want the lovers to be? Choose the second player
the Hunter 🎯
Cupid 🏹
the Serial Killer 🔪
the Doppelgänger 🎭
Cupids arrow has struck you! You are madly in love with {0}! If they die, you will die too. If you both make it to the end, you will both win.
You have become the wild child. You role model is {0}
True love endures! The lovers have won!
In the middle of the town square, everyone finds the body of {0}, multiple shots to the body. Looks like they tried to sneak up on the Hunter! {1}
A hooded figure tried to convert you to their cult, but your faith was too strong
You are already on the wait list for {0}
You have been added to the wait list for {0}. I will PM you when the next game is starting.\nWhile waiting, why not browse the store? https://teespring.com/stores/werewolf-for-telegram
A new game is starting in {0}
Morning comes, and the remaining two villagers walk out to the town square. {0} takes a look at {1}, gets a big grin on their face, pulls out a knife, and takes {1} out.
Everyone in the village has died... there's nothing but bodies left. No one wins this round, except the vultures...

As the sun rises, {0} and {1} walk out into the village. {0} pulls out their knife, and jumps at {1}. {1} pulls out a pistol and fires a shot into {0}'s face as {0} lands, plunging the knife deep into {1}. Both are dead, the village is empty, there is no winner...
You failed to make a choice, so the moderator has chosen for you: {0}
Won
Lost
Player {0} has been killed for not voting {1} times in the past 24 hours.
Your role is simple - try to survive. Each day, you will have a chance to lynch the werewolf.
You are the Seer. In this role, each night, you may choose a player, and have their role revealed to you. Admit to your role wisely: If you reveal you are the seer, the wolves will try to kill you!

You get to have fun! Each day, you will attempt to decieve your fellow players. However, each night, you will get to pick a player to kill! Note:if you attack the drunk, you yourself will become drunk, and will be unable to attack the next night as you sleep off your hangover! If you attack the cursed, they will become a wolf like yourself! Hooray friends!

As the harlot (you slut...) you will be given the chance to 'visit' another player each night. If they are not the wolf, you will be told so (because you live!). If you visit a wolf, you will be killed. If you visit the player the wolves have chosen to kill, you will be killed as well. However - If you are visiting a player, and the wolves choose to kill you, you will survive (you weren't home)
You drunken bastard! As the drunk, you are still just a villager. BUT! If the wolves kill you, they will become disabled for the next night, as they are drunk off your insanely high BAC.
As the cursed, you are a normal villager... until the wolves kill you. Once they do, you will become a wolf as well! Free to hunt in the night..... XD
You are a traitorous bastard. If you survive long enough for all the wolves to die, you will become a werewolf, ready to kill your former teammates in the night!
You are the Guardian Angel! Each night, you may choose a player to watch over. Be careful however - if you choose to watch over a wolf, there is a 50% chance you will be killed.
You old sleuth. Each day, you will have the chance to investigate another player. Use this carefully however, for these is a 40% chance the werewolves will detect you!

A bit trigger happy are we? As the gunner, you are given 2 silver bullets at the beginning of the game. Each day, you will have the chance to shoot another player. Once you do, everyone will know you are the gunner! Be careful though, you only have 2 bullets!
The Tanners goal is simple: Get Lynched. If the Tanner gets lynched, he wins, period. Everyone else loses.
he fool is told they are the seer.... when they choose to see someone's role at night, they are told a random role.
As a cultist, it is your goal to convert all other players (except wolves) to your cult. If at the end of the game, all living players are cultist - the cult wins
Your job is to hunt the Cult. If the cult attacks you, their newest member will die. Each night you may pick a player to 'hunt' - if they are a cultist, they will die.
At the beginning of the game, you will choose someone to be your 'role model'. If they die, you become a werewolf.
For now, you are a normal villager. However, if the seer dies, you will become the new seer
You will be told who the seer is (the real one, not the fool)
A mason's job is simple - they automatically know who the other masons are. Otherwise, they are a simple villager.

Your ancestors had the ability to metamorph into others... while you don't have their full abilities, you can pick a player at the start of the game. If that player dies, you will become what they were. Note: If the player was converted to cult, you will take on their original role. All other normal rules apply: If they were Wild Child and their role model died, you will become a wolf. Otherwise, you will inherit their role model. The cult cannot convert the Doppelgänger (but can after the doppelganger switches roles). Also - the Doppelgänger can NOT win unless they have transformed. If at the end of the game, the Doppelgänger is still the same, they lose (exception: lover)

Love is in the air. As Cupid, you will choose two players at the start of the game. These two players will become madly in love! If one of them dies, the other will die of sorrow :( Note: Lovers will know who each other are, but not be told their roles. If the lovers are the last two alive, they win, regardless of teams. If the lovers are on different teams (villager + wolf), and one team wins (wolf), the lover (villager) wins as well. TL;DR if both lovers are alive at the end, and at least one of them was on the winning team, they both win together

A trigger happy, vindictive player. As the hunter, you try to keep to yourself. However, when others come to visit you, they may find themselves dead, as your paranoia takes hold and you shoot. If the wolves attack you, you have a chance to take one of them with you. Otherwise, if you die, you will get a chance to shoot someone as you die. Note: For wolf attacks, the chance starts at 30%. If there is one wolf, the hunter has a 30% chance to kill the wolf (and survive). For each additional wolf, add 20% (2 wolves = 50%, 3 = 70%, etc). However - if there are multiple wolves, while you may kill one of them, you will still be outnumbered and killed. If the cult tries to convert you, they have a 50% chance to fail. If they fail, you have a 50% chance to kill one of them!

That asylum was silly anyways. What a joke. You are free now however, back to business as usual - killing! The serial killer is a lone player, on their own team. They can win only if they are the last player alive (exception: lovers). As the serial killer, you can kill ANYONE - wolves, hunters, gunners, guardian angels, whatever. If the wolves try to attack you, you will kill one of them (random), and live.
Para is a silly developer that likes to bark at people. Maybe he's been messing with werewolves too long....Messing with werewolves is a very bad idea.
